channel.title: Any Ideas how to fix this {Duel Screen}
channel.description: ^^ any ideas how to fix this? Btw, I can't find the sprite for this, so don't go saying just put some words on the sprites, it works and everything, but you just don't know what you're clicking... [IMG]http://i1143.photobucket.com/albums/n622/xxStooksxx/duelscreen.png[/img]

item.title: Any Ideas how to fix this {Duel Screen}
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“stooks, post:11, topic:416521”]k i’ll try.

Edit: There is no “fun weapons” in tradeandduel.java, so none of the others could be located and changed there :l[/quote]

“Fun Weapons” is the default interface text for that specific option.

Read full topic

yeh i’ve done a TONTONTON of work with it though, fixed like, ALL of the glitches, dicing, and almost done with dungeoneering so yeah, just getting around to the minors.[quote author=jitter link=topic=518422.msg3767532#msg3767532 date=1317357589]
this is teamtorva right?

[/quote]
[/quote]

Its just text related, all you need to know.[/quote]

yes but where would i put it?

item.title: Any Ideas how to fix this {Duel Screen}
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Sounds like there’s a code somewhere in the server that does something like

for (int i = 0; i < 20000; i++) {
    sendQuest(i, "");
}

Basically setting every possible interface string to an empty one.

Read full topic
